dleplugin.name: Advanced Search
dleplugin.mysqlenable: INSERT INTO {prefix}_admin_sections (name, title, descr, icon, allow_groups) VALUES ('advancedsearch', 'Advanced Search', 'Advanced Search CMS', '/engine/skins/images/icons/advancedsearch.png', 1);
dleplugin.notice:
Module creator ehmedp,
The AdvancedSearch plugin enhances search capabilities on your DataLife Engine website.
It allows users to perform advanced searches across different sections with customizable filters and options.
Easily configurable and lightweight, this plugin provides a more refined search experience for your site's visitors.
